name: RETRIEVE
description: Retrieves facts from the system knowledge-base

patterns.description: patterns that the target facts should match

negative patterns.description: negative patterns that the target facts should NOT match

names.description: substrings that the names of the target facts should contain

name: CHOOSE
description: Instantiate witnesses of existential quantifications in the proof goal.

inst.description: Terms of witnesses to instantiate. The number of the terms must be smaller than the number of the leading existential quantifications in the goal.

name: RULE
description: Reduce the proof goal by applying a reasoning rule

rule.description: The reasoning rule to apply. If omitted, the default rule will be taken.

name: CASE_SPLIT
description: Apply structural case analysis over a given term.

target.description: target term of the case analysis

name: INDUCT
description: Apply induction over a given term.

arbitrary.description: variables to be re-quantified universally in each induction subgoal, allowing them to take different values in different inductive cases, rather than being fixed to a single value throughout the entire induction

rule.description: optional induction rule indicating how the induction should work

name: ATP
description: Apply Automated Theorem Provers (e.g., SMT solvers) to prove a simple goal.

lemmas.description: additional lemmas that can be helpful for proving the goal

name: BRANCH
description: Conduct case-by-case discussion and split the proof goal into cases

cases.description: The cases that the proof goal is split into. Each case can consist of more than one conditions.

items.description: the expression of the subgoal proposition

name: OBTAIN
description: Extract witnesses from existential statements, e.g., let x be such that P(x)
